context: Hi. If you're a horror fan The Shape of Water (2017) and A Quiet Place (2018) are highly recommended
If you're a war fan I liked Black Hawk Down (2002) and The Hurt Locker (2008)
I really liked A Quiet Place (2018)
Have you see The Hatching (2016) I preferred the book but . . .
The only war movie I've ever seen was Apocalypse Now (1979) Do you know any war movies like that?
Apocalypse Now (1979) was an awesome film. You haven't seen The Sniper (2009) ?
No, I haven't Was Bradley Cooper in that?
How about zombie stuff? World War Z Don;t know about Bradley Cooper I don't focus much on the actors' names
World War Z was a really interesting movie I liked how matter-of-fact it all felt What's your all-time favorite movie? I'd like to watch that
Yes, World War Z was great! My favorite movie is Against All Odds (1984) What's your all time favorite?
Oh, Jeff Bridges is great I like Fargo (1996)
resp: Oh, yes, Jeff . . . sigh! I haven't see Fargo (1996)
